author: FABRICE COFFRINI
title: Nestle has found itself in hot water over filtering so-called natural mineral waters
text:
Nestle has found itself in hot water over filtering so-called natural mineral waters
- FABRICE COFFRINI
- Updated
Tags
As featured on
French authorities ordered Nestle on Wednesday to stop filtering its Perrier and held back on allowing the under-pressure brand from using the description 'natural mineral water'.
